page.title: 03YOXALL TRADE
page.content: Cothayes plant nursery,supplying retail trade,is situated beside Thimble Hall,facing School Green. Below,on the right,is the Old Store. A reconstruction of its 1890's interior is at present in Shugborough County Museum. At the junction of Hadley St. and King St. are ,to the left,Yoxall Post Office,combined with a self service grocery store. To the right,is a family butcher with abattoirto the rear of its premises _ formerly used as a public-house. A mother and daughter run the Village Craft Shop and a Village Beauty Shop respectively adjacent to the village Primary School.At the junction of Victoria St. and Main St. is Heron and Sons antique shop. Continuing on the left of Main St. is the Golden Cup public house which serves bar meals.
